name: Attack it! Devil legion
detailed_description:
◆Game play◆

This is a strategic action game. You can deploy various teams to defeat your enemies,
there are 8 characters in the game, each character has 2 modes.
Picking appropriate teammates to beat each level is the key of success.



◆Game content◆

This game uses pixel art to illustrate Hentai content.
A total of more than 70 H animations, and a variety of color differential!
Contain with Gellary and practice mode, include all H animations used in the game!

There are 28 levels in total and the estimated completion time is 4-5 hours.


Use the power of minions, make Demon great again!

short_description: In the 60th Anniversary of the treaty of peace between Human and Mazoku, the new Mao received a great mission to MAKE MAZOKU GREAT AGAIN. However, time has changed, power is no longer the key to conquer the world, waves of challenges await...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: "Attack it! Devil legion" is a female domination porn game with pixel arts, telling a demon how to retrieve his throne through a witty story.
